Packages

package  agent_atGoal
 

Agent has arrived at its goal location.


package  agent_chooseNewGoal_delayed
 

Agent has should choose a new goal location.


package  application_start
 

Application start event This is hooked by pnm.application.Application.start before entering the render loop.


package  input_mouseMoved
 

Move movement event.


package  input_moveBackward
 

Move the camera backwards (positive in the z-axis).


package  input_moveDown
 

Move the camera down (negative in the y-axis).


package  input_moveForward
 

Move the camera forward (negative in the z-axis).


package  input_moveLeft
 

Move the camera left (positive in the x-axis).


package  input_moveRight
 

Move the camera right (negative in the x-axis).


package  input_moveUp
 

Move the camera up (positive in the y-axis).


package  input_quitApplication
 

Exit the application.


package  input_resetView
 

Reset the camera's position.


package  ping
 

A ping event (for debugging).


package  render_frameStarted
 

FrameStart event hooked just prior to the frame beggining rendering.


package  render_windowQuit
 

Window quit event.
